mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, job) VALUES (member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{job})
mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, (SELECT code_name FROM code_detail WHERE group_code = "A00" AND code_value = job) AS job, coin, reg_date FROM member ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET user_name = #{userName}, job = #{job} WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
